mapper.insert: insert into TRSkynetPatrolEventInvolvedPersons (SPEPersonsID, SPEventID, InvolvedPersonCertID, InvolvedPersonName, InvolvedPersonRemark, InvolvedPersonContact) values (#{spEPersonsID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{spEventID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{involvedPersonCertID,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{involvedPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{involvedPersonRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{involvedPersonContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update TRSkynetPatrolEventInvolvedPersons set SPEventID = #{spEventID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, InvolvedPersonCertID = #{involvedPersonCertID,jdbcType=CHAR}, InvolvedPersonName = #{involvedPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, InvolvedPersonRemark = #{involvedPersonRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, InvolvedPersonContact = #{involvedPersonContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SPEPersonsID = #{spEPersonsID,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select SPEPersonsID, SPEventID, InvolvedPersonCertID, InvolvedPersonName, InvolvedPersonRemark, InvolvedPersonContact from TRSkynetPatrolEventInvolvedPersons where SPEPersonsID = #{SPEPersonsID,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select SPEPersonsID, SPEventID, InvolvedPersonCertID, InvolvedPersonName, InvolvedPersonRemark, InvolvedPersonContact from TRSkynetPatrolEventInvolvedPersons where SPEventID = #{id}
select SPEPersonsID, SPEventID, InvolvedPersonCertID, InvolvedPersonName, InvolvedPersonRemark, InvolvedPersonContact from TRSkynetPatrolEventInvolvedPersons
